# UNICEF Mozambique Open Data Kit Form for the Simple Spatial Survey Method (S3M) in Sofala Province

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository contains the Simple Spatial Survey Method (S3M) survey instrument in XLSForm and XForm standard for use in Open Data Kit developed for UNICEF Mozambique.

This form (`sofala_s3m.xlsx` and `sofala_s3m.xml`) is for use in the Sofala Province Simple Spatial Survey Method (S3M).
